Veuillez sélectionnez un jour de la semaine pour afficher la carte prédictive correspondante.

```{=html}
<select id="day-select">
  <option value="carte_prediction_lundi.html">Lundi</option>
  <option value="carte_prediction_mardi.html">Mardi</option>
  <option value="carte_prediction_mercredi.html">Mercredi</option>
  <option value="carte_prediction_jeudi.html">Jeudi</option>
  <option value="carte_prediction_vendredi.html">Vendredi</option>
  <option value="carte_prediction_samedi.html">Samedi</option>
  <option value="carte_prediction_dimanche.html">Dimanche</option>
</select>

<iframe id="map-frame" src="carte_prediction_semaine/carte_prediction_lundi.html" width="800" height="600"></iframe>

<script>
  document.getElementById('day-select').addEventListener('change', function() {
    var selectedDay = this.value;
    document.getElementById('map-frame').src = "carte_prediction_semaine/" + selectedDay;
  });
</script>
